title: How I imagine ADC mains see their supports.

replies.body: Odd, I see my support as my equal partner or even better than me for I am nothing without them.
oddly enough i feel as if supports are the play makers for bot.

Most of the time its a support that defines a matchup as most ADC's are lanebullys or Vayne.

This is why I love picking Malphite support against Vayne with SIvir xD

As a support main, I feel like that's only true for other supports >.>

I can't do anything lol

> [{quoted}](name=TheGosuStandard,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=A9btPY5N,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-08-01T14:20:16.512+0000)
>
> oddly enough i feel as if supports are the play makers for bot.

Nothing odd about that.  True statements are true.  I main Miss Fortune, so even though she's a decent lane bully, she really IS VERY dependent on the support to set up her first kills.  Not having any hard CC of her own.
http://cdn3.gurl.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/06/oldhollywood_getout.gif

I feel violated. 

+1
"Bread man walking" {{champion:104}}

I'm not quite sure where people get this idea that ADC's are such self centered, self important, me me me machines.  I mean, literally EVERY lane has people who play that position who feel that way.  But they can't be the majority, and I don't understand why ADC's get the most stigma from this, lol.  

I main ADC, and, I definitely give my support all the thanks and appreciation that I can, because my lane is so heavily dependent on my support doing well!  Supports doing get the "glorious" number of kills that other lanes get, but if they do poorly in my lane, it impacts the entire lane so much.  They are INSTRUMENTAL in developing the ADC into the late game character that they are.
not jungle. JUNGLE 5 LIFE.
I have seen plenty of toxic junglers. They just want to farm early and carry the game late.

It tends to be that way because a lot of the toxic people in bronze-gold (probably higher) always want ADC.
They also get to be defended, healed, get tanked, have fights set up before their eyes, and yet a lot of these toxic people will still find a way to complain.

It's because the role (nominally, at least) requires another player to set you up for success from the word "go". Other lanes are solo (and still yell at the jungler XD). But there are two people in bot lane, and one of them is expected to be fed all the CS and kills if it's feasible. In late game teamfights, the rest of the team is peeling so all that damage you built in the laning phase can do its work. It's not that ADC's are toxic and selfish, or become that way. It's that the role tends to ATTRACT people who already are, because other players serve/wait on/sacrifice for the ADC, and that appeals to selfish people.

This of course does NOT mean that anyone who plays ADC is automatically selfish. In fact, it's pretty difficult to be any good at the role if you are. Because it involves so much support and teamplay, it pays to be a team player. But you already knew that. :)

It's because as a Nautilus main I end up getting many of the first few kills because the adc had to flash away with 10hp while I E and get a double kill. After that happens twice, the ADC gets butt hurt and is like, "Omg, I guess I'm support now. This is so dumb." I'm like, "Hey man, no worries. You'll get the later kills, just trust me." And they reply, "Nah man. This is dumb" Um.. okay?

Also, most people are like, "Omg, thanks Sivir for that carry!" And I'm over here 3/0/25. Kay, no problem.
Only twice has the ADC then given that credit to the support.

> [{quoted}](name=DragoonRuin,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=A9btPY5N,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-01T13:59:30.667+0000)
> Supports **don't** get the "glorious" number of kills that other lanes get...

What are you talking about? :p

Blitz supp, Teemo ADC, Sona top ('cause instalock is still a thing).
dude upvote all the upvote speak the truth brother {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

In my experience both supports and adcs have their bad moments. I think it's that bot lanes are interdependent on each other and see everything they do, and in the distrustful environment that LoL has it's usually a bad thing.

^
I have supported wonderful adcs and super toxic adcs, and I have played adc with wonderful supports and super toxic supports. For some reason, the bad ones tend to be Thresh.
I'd say SOME adcs are like that, but many realize just how important supports are to the game.

that's weird, I don't feel like butter when I'm support. I feel more like the person at the customer service counter getting bitched at by a customer who knew they bought cloths too small for themselves and blame me for it .__.

this is how things should be but supports and ADCS just can never get it through anyones head. I'm a adc main I've supported and on both ends ive had super awsome and super toxic partners with constant posts like this no wonder no one wants to bot
The support is a slave to the ADC. We already knew that. :^)
you got that backwards ADC is slave to support
Not when I'm playing ADC, no.
wow so your one of those adcs that give the rest of us bad names >_>

Honestly? When I get a bad support I tell them to F- off and go other lane.

If I have to lose a lane it better be my own fault than because I get a vegetable for a teammate.
Hell, I might even have a chance to win this way.

PS. I play ADC once in a month.
then you really have no room to talk

This is why this community is such a crap.

Most of you can't take shit with a grain of salt.
https://media2.giphy.com/media/k9XrZaAJuQyMU/200_s.gif
how is talking shit when you don't main the role and when you play the role you are the very reason why people hate adc mains taking shit with a grain of salt?
Because that doesn't happen? Did you even read what I wrote?

Funny story that kinda contradicts this:
It's early in the laning phase. I'm the ADC Jinx, we have our support Tahm there. Tahm is zoning and poking and doing all of his support things, and he gets an enemy to low health. He engages fully, and I follow up. One of the enemies gets kinda trapped by the minions, and Tahm Q's them. I send a Rocket and a W in, and I get First Blood.

Our Jungler: GJ
Me: GJ
Our Mid: Wut
Yaaaaaaay hate trains
I'm a bit disturbed. +1
Which is why so many ADCs struggle. Working in synch with your support wins lane, wins game.

I'm an ADC Kennen main so I don't apply xD

Most of the time I'm super nice to my support because they probably don't want to deal with an ADC Kennen then I give them the most fun support game ever ;)
